page.title: 06A Saturday in my Life
page.content: My name is Linzee Gittoes.I live at 36 Glan y Nant with my mother and father and brother Julian.When I get up on Saturday I open the blinds in my bedroom,I dress,go downstairs and boil the kettle.I put the television on at 8.30 a.m.to watch Wide Awake Club. I have my breakfast and at 10 a.m.I watch No 73.It is my favourite programme.If I do not watch television I go to Bargoed on the 9.40 a.m.bus. When we have bought all our shopping, we get on the 11.30 bus to go home. After dinner at 1.30 p.m.I wash the dishes and my mother dries them.At 2.30 p.m. my Nan takes me to see my other Nan in Rhymney.She lives on her own because my Grandpa died 4 years ago.When we come home from Rhymney we watch the television.
